Current epidemiologic evidence suggest 80 % sexually active woman become infected lifetime human papillomavirus 50 % infection due high-risk human papillomavirus . With US annual rate cervical cancer range 13,000/year , substantial number woman leave uncertainty regard whether infection clear spontaneously progress cancer . Subjects participate study require visit clinic approximately 15 16 visit , maintain diary self-dosing menstruation cycle . The total time participation study approximately 27 month .
